channel.title: Visa on Study In Taiwan
channel.description: Recent content in Visa on Study In Taiwan

item.title: Visa Information for Students in Taiwan
item.description: VISA In Taiwan, there is no specific “Student Visa” category. Instead, foreign students can apply for either a Visitor Visa or a Resident Visa, depending on the duration of their program. Types of Visa Visitor Visa: Suitable for stays of less than 6 months. Resident Visa: Required for programs lasting longer than 6 months. Taiwan (ROC) Embassies and Missions Abroad Taiwan has over 109 embassies and missions in 73 countries. Students should contact the nearest Taiwanese embassy or mission in their country for visa application.
